Module codex.lb
Package codex.lb04.Model

Class Card

java.lang.Object
codex.lb04.Model.Card
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GoldCard, InitialCard, ObjectiveCard, ResourceCard
public class Card extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a generic card
See Also:

    • Card

      public Card(Color color, Face front, Face back, Integer points, Integer ID, Integer x, Integer y, boolean isShowingFront, boolean usedForPositionalObjectives)
      constructor for cards with coordinates
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the card
      front - the front face of the card
      back - the back face of the card
      points - the points of the card
      ID - the ID of the card
      x - the x coordinate of the card
      y - the y coordinate of the card
      isShowingFront - true if the card is showing the front face
      usedForPositionalObjectives - true if the card is used for positional objectives

      public void setUsedForPositionalObjectives(boolean usedForPositionalObjectives)
